author: costin
msg: Moved error handling in a normal interceptor.
- allow customization of error handling ( including what to show, etc)
- allow multiple "facades" ( that's a particular case of customized
error handling - i.e. we customize based on interpretations specific to
- "evolution by mini-revolutions" - the code for error handling is complex,
anyone can experiment with better implementations.
The change involves a new callback ( where we hook the exeception handling
Also, moved the standard error handlers in the new ErrorHandler ( from
